# FastStream

> FastStream is a powerful and easy-to-use Python framework for building asynchronous services interacting with event streams such as Apache Kafka, RabbitMQ, NATS and Redis.

## Tutorial

- [Getting Started](https://faststream.ag2.ai/latest/getting-started/)
- [Configuration](https://faststream.ag2.ai/latest/getting-started/config/)
- [Subscription Basics](https://faststream.ag2.ai/latest/getting-started/subscription/)
- [Publishing Messages](https://faststream.ag2.ai/latest/getting-started/publishing/)
- [Command Line Interface](https://faststream.ag2.ai/latest/getting-started/cli/)
- [AsyncAPI Specification](https://faststream.ag2.ai/latest/getting-started/asyncapi/export)

## Brokers

- [Kafka](https://faststream.ag2.ai/latest/kafka/)
- [RabbitMQ](https://faststream.ag2.ai/latest/rabbit/)
- [NATS](https://faststream.ag2.ai/latest/nats/)
- [Redis](https://faststream.ag2.ai/latest/redis/)

## Advanced

- [Context](https://faststream.ag2.ai/latest/getting-started/context/)
- [Dependencies](https://faststream.ag2.ai/latest/getting-started/dependencies/)
- [Routers](https://faststream.ag2.ai/latest/getting-started/routers/)
- [Middlewares](https://faststream.ag2.ai/latest/getting-started/middlewares/)
- [Lifespan Events](https://faststream.ag2.ai/latest/getting-started/lifespan/)
- [Filtering](https://faststream.ag2.ai/latest/getting-started/subscription/filtering/)
- [Scheduling Tasks](https://faststream.ag2.ai/latest/scheduling/)

## Optional

- [Cookiecutter Template](https://faststream.ag2.ai/latest/getting-started/template/)
- [Django Integration](https://faststream.ag2.ai/latest/getting-started/integrations/django/)
- [FastAPI Integration](https://faststream.ag2.ai/latest/getting-started/integrations/fastapi/)
- [Logging](https://faststream.ag2.ai/latest/getting-started/observability/logging/)
- [OpenTelemetry](https://faststream.ag2.ai/latest/getting-started/observability/opentelemetry/)
- [Prometheus](https://faststream.ag2.ai/latest/getting-started/observability/prometheus/)
- [Testing](https://faststream.ag2.ai/latest/getting-started/subscription/test/)
